name: css-outlines
description: Css module of single purpose classes for outlines

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-outlines.css > css/css-outlines.css && tachyons src/css-outlines.css --minify > css/css-outlines.min.css && tachyons src/css-outlines.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
